title: Welcome to new Going Forward into Employment Deputy Director Dr Victoria Hanna

content.text: In this GFiE Blog edition; we welcome our new Going Forward into Employment (GFiE) Deputy Director Dr Victoria Hanna and get to know a little more about Victoria and her first impressions of GFiE.
To receive notifications of GFiE Blogs please register your email address at the Sign up and manage updates section.

If you would like to know know more about GFiE Life Chance Pathways, or are a civil servant and want to discuss providing life changing opportunities to individuals by using GFiE to recruit into vacancies you have coming up, please get in contact with the GfiE Team at GFiE@cabinetoffice.gov.uk
